comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Lilian Leitzel was one of the twentieth century's brightest circus stars, and died in a fall due to an equipment failure during a performance in Copenhagen in 1931. Her biography at the Ringling/Barnum & Bailey site: www.ringling.com/ContentPage.aspx?id=45835&section=45825 Flickr user CasualClicks tells her story accompanied by photos of her tomb in Inglewood, California: www.flickr.com/photos/casualclicks/sets/72157594187838951/

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: LOC, you have Dolly Jahn's name spelled two ways in your note. Jahn is the correct spelling. She grew up to be an aerialist with Ringling/Barnum. Here is her obituary. She died at the age of 63 on September 1, 1984. news.google.com/newspapers?nid=1755&dat=19840902&...

comment.author: 33593953@N02
comment._content: artolog: Thanks for the additional information, alert about the typo, and the citations. We'll adjust the description when we next update.
